title: Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Streamline your Snowflake journey with comprehensive documentation and learning resources
Learn about the applications and tools that you can use to access Snowflake
Learn how to create and manage warehouses, which are used to process queries
Learn how to create and manage databases, tables, and views for storing and accessing your data
Learn about the different options for getting data into Snowflake and setting up a pipeline to transform your data
New features, enhancements, and important behavior changes introduced in the most recent Snowflake releases.
We are pleased to announce the general availability of Snowflake Open Catalog.
We are pleased to announce the general availability of Snowflake Notebooks on Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) commercial regions.
Cortex Analyst - Multi-turn conversation and Join support
Stay informed and discover the latest updates, improvements, and enhancements
Behavior changes that may impact your usage
All features that can improve performance and make queries run faster
